Crunchyroll Player

Devices: Desktop

Format: Flash

The Crunchyroll player is powered by Flash and enables users to watch Crunchyroll content on desktop devices.

Hulu Player

Devices: Desktop

Format: Flash/JavaScript

The Hulu player is powered by Flash and enables users to watch Hulu content on desktop devices.

Livestream Clip iOS Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The Livestream Clip player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.

Livestream Clip Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5

The Livestream Clip player is powered by HTML5 and enables users to watch Livestream Clip content on iOS and desktop devices.

Livestream Event iOS Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The Livestream Event player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.

Livestream Event Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5

The Livestream Event player is powered by HTML5 and enables users to watch Livestream Event content on iOS and desktop devices.

Vimeo Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5

The Vimeo player is powered by HTML5 and enables users to watch Vimeo content on iOS and desktop devices.

Vimeo PRO (Native) Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5

The Vimeo PRO player powered by HTML5 and enables users to watch Vimeo PRO content on iOS and desktop devices.

Vimeo PRO (Zype) Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5/Flash/JavaScript

The Vimeo PRO player powered by HTML5, Flash or JavaScript and enables users to watch Vimeo PRO content on iOS and desktop devices.

Vimeo PRO Roku Player

Devices: Roku

Format: JSON

The Vimeo PRO player for Roku provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for Roku devices.

YouTube iOS Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The YouTube player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.

YouTube Player

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5

The YouTube player powered by HTML5 and enables users to watch YouTube content on iOS and desktop devices.

Zype Player (AVOD)

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5/Flash/JavaScript

The Zype player powered by HTML5, Flash or JavaScript and enables users to watch ad enabled content on iOS and desktop devices.

Zype Player (SVOD)

Devices: Desktop, iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: HTML5/Flash/JavaScript

The Zype player powered by HTML5, Flash or JavaScript and enables users to watch subscription enabled content on iOS and desktop devices.

Roku Player

Devices: Roku

Format: JSON

The Zype player for Roku that provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for Roku devices.

Zype Audio Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The Zype player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.

Zype Download Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The Zype player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.

Zype iOS Player

Devices: iOS, iPad, iPod, iPhone

Format: JSON

The Zype player for iOS provides a JSON response that includes a URL to embed in webviews for iOS devices.
